Section.Label: AuxiliarProperties
Section.Heading: Semisimple group algebras of finite groups

Prop.Name: IsZeroCharacteristicGroupAlgebra
Prop.Comm: Is a group algebra of a finite group over the field of char zero?

ManSection.Description: Returns true if KG is the group algebra of a finite group over the field of characteristic zero, and false if KG is another kind of a group ring.

Prop.Name: IsSemisimpleRationalGroupAlgebra
Prop.Comm: Is rational group algebra of finite group?

ManSection.Description: Returns true if KG is the rational group algebra of a finite group and false if it is another kind of group ring.

Prop.Name: IsSemisimpleFiniteGroupAlgebra
Prop.Comm: Is a group algebra of a finite group over a finite field?

ManSection.Description: Returns true if KG is a semisimple finite group algebra, that is a group algebra of a finite group G with coefficients on a field of order coprime with the order of G, and false if it is another type of group ring.

Section.Label: AuxiliarOperations
Section.Heading: Operations over group rings elements

Oper.Name: Centralizer
Oper.Comm: Centralizer on a subgroup of a group ring element in

ManSection.Returns: a subgroup of a group G.
ManSection.Description: Returns the centralizer of an element a of a group ring FH in a subgroup G of the underlying group H of FH.

ManSection.Returns: an element of a group ring
ManSection.Description:
Returns the conjugate a^g = g^{-1} a g of a by g where a is an element of a group ring FG and g is an element of the underlying group G.
a^g produces the same output.

ManSection.Returns: an element of a group ring
ManSection.Description: Returns the element of the group algebra FG obtaining summing up the elements of X divided by the order of X, where X is a finite subset of the underlying group G of FG whose order is not multiple of the characteristic of the field F.

Section.Label: CC
Section.Heading: Cyclotomic classes

ManSection.Description: Returns the q-cyclotomic classes module n, where q and n are relatively prime positive integers.
Returns true if C is a q-cyclotomic class module n and false otherwise, for q and n relatively prime integers and C a subset of [0 .. n]. .
